description: Developed radar software on Green Hills Integrity using C and ADA.
Designed and implemented the software of embedded devices and systems from requirements to production deployment.
Lead software design meeting consisting of ICD designs and Sequence Diagrams
Designed and built mobile applications for Apple's iOS platform.
Ensured quality and performance of the application to specifications.
Maintained application by fixing bugs before the final release before publishing application on App Store.
While at CSUF, I complete a wide range of projects from high level embedded in Python to iOS applications
